definitions.definition: A flat-bottomed boat or other floating structure used as a buoyant support for a temporary bridge , dock or landing stage .
( by extension ) A bridge with floating supports .
A box used to raise a sunken vessel .
A lighter or barge used for loading or unloading ships.

main_definition: A flat-bottomed boat or other floating structure used as a buoyant support for a temporary bridge , dock or landing stage .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A bridge with floating supports .
A box used to raise a sunken vessel .
A lighter or barge used for loading or unloading ships.

definitions.definition: A card game in which the object is to obtain cards whose value adds up to, or nearly to, 21 but not exceed it.

main_definition: ( card games ) A card game in which the object is to obtain cards whose value adds up to, or nearly to, 21 but not exceed it.
